content: The Sobering Stone is one of the Key Items you can find in Yellow Wind Ridge. It is vital to one of the main side quests in the Yellow Wind Ridge and accessing the Kingdom of Sahali secret area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sobering_Stone.md', within the main section titled 'Sobering Stone'.
The content is as follows:
The Sobering Stone is one of the Key Items you can find in Yellow Wind Ridge. It is vital to one of the main side quests in the Yellow Wind Ridge and accessing the Kingdom of Sahali secret area.
